SAEF EZEIZA FIR SEV TURB FCST AT 1022Z
WI S3359 W06311 - S3752 W06133 - S3823 W06252 - S3603 W06450 - S3351
W06430 - S3407 W06322 - S3359 W06311 FL320/360 MOV E 10KT INTSF==

WSAG31 SACO 131004

WI S3252 W06551 - S2901 W06630 - S2821 W06155 - S3004 W06040 - S3057

WSMO31 ZMUB 130900
ZMUB SIGMET 02 VALID 131000/131600 ZMUB -
ZMUB ULAANBAATAR FIR SEV TURB FCST W OF LINE N5137 E10055 - N4301
E10650 FL270/340 MOV E 20KMH NC==

WSUS32 KKCI 131355 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET...NONE 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 131555-131955 
TS ARE NOT EXPD TO REQUIRE WST ISSUANCES.
==

WSUS33 KKCI 131355 
SIGW  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET...NONE 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 131555-131955 
FROM 70SW BCE-70SSW RSK-50WSW SJN-PHX-40ESE EED-70SW BCE 
WST ISSUANCES POSS ELY IN PD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS 
FROM STORM PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL 
DETAILS.
==

WSUS31 KKCI 131355 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 35E 
VALID UNTIL 1555Z 
DE NJ NY MD VA CSTL WTRS 
FROM 60SSW HTO-50ENE ORF 
LINE TS 50 NM WIDE MOV FROM 22055KT. TOPS TO FL300. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 131555-131955 
AREA 1...FROM 150SE SIE-180ESE ECG-140SSE ILM-40W PIE-140W 
PIE-160S CEW-30SSW FLO-RIC-150SE SIE 
REF WW 117 118. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM MPV-30E ACK-160SE SIE-LYH-40WNW ERI-40E BUF-40E 
SYR-MPV 
REF WW 118. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==

WSUS31 KKCI 131355 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 34E 
VALID UNTIL 1555Z 
MD VA NC SC FL GA AND NC VA FL SC GA CSTL WTRS 
FROM 30SSE DCA-170ESE ECG-120W PIE-150S CEW-30NW CHS-30SSE DCA 
AREA SEV EMBD TS MOV FROM 23060KT. TOPS ABV FL450. 
TORNADOES...HAIL TO 2.0 IN...WIND GUSTS TO 60KT POSS.

AREA 1...FROM 150SE SIE-180ESE ECG-140SSE ILM-40W PIE-140W
